Starting Monday, Feb. 23, due to increased rider demand, this route will be revised to operate from Kipling Bus Terminal to Laird Road and Ridgeway Drive via University of Toronto Mississauga. Service frequencies will also be improved during weekday and weekend core hours. Visit miway.ca for more information.

Starting Monday, Feb. 23, to enhance transit service connections, this route will be extended from South Common Centre to serve the University of Toronto Mississauga. Service frequencies will also be improved during weekdays and weekends.

Starting Monday, Feb. 23, to accommodate the Route 48 Erin Mills extension to University of Toronto Mississauga, this route will have a new routing into South Common Centre and bus stops at and near South Common Centre will be revised. Visit miway.ca for more information.
